features: Handheld Steamer: This steamer features 1100 watts of power and provides up to 10 minutes of continuous, deep penetrating steam.

Compact Design: This steamer is ideal for travel and on the go touchups, heating up fast and dewrinkling fabrics in minutes. Features an ergonomic handle, spill protection feature, and measures only 9 x 5.5 inches with a large, removable steam head.
Smoothes, Dewrinkles and Freshens: Features a large, removable steam head, ergonomic handle, easy to fill removeable 4.9 ounce water tank and 8 foot power cord.

Conair Fabric Steamers: Our garment steamers have earned the Good Housekeeping Seal and keep your clothing, upholstery, curtains and other home fabrics smooth and fresh. Check out entire line including handheld, upright and travel steamers.
Innovative Garment Care: From fabric shavers and traditional irons to garment steamers, both handheld and full size, we make high-quality garment care accessories.
body.description: Make your life a little smoother with the Conair Complete Steam Hand Held Fabric Steamer. This natural steamer – just add water and save time and money with fewer trips to the dry cleaners! Why steam? This steamer quickly and easily de-wrinkles with steam that penetrates fabric to safely smooth out wrinkles that would otherwise be damaged from ironing. Wanting to freshen fabrics? This steamer is just the tool to refresh and smooth fabrics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great on my Drapes
reviews.reviewText: I had been shopping the local cleaners to a location that was experienced in dry cleaning lined drapes. The drapes are very special to me therefore I wanted realiable professionally dry cleaner. I wanted to clean them before hanging them but unfortunately it wasn't as easy to locate a trustworthy location as it use to be. Fortunately dry cleaning being them could be postponed and was more of a choice than a need. Unfortunately the weeks they spend stuffed in a bag caused wrinkles that wouldn't just fall out from just hanging them. I decided to search for a steamer, after searching reviews I purchased this one. I am pleasantly surprised in how well it worked. I was able to steam them without taking them back down. The only issue is the water reservoir is very small so it runs out fast and the instructions stressed you must wait for it to cool before refilling so even smaller projects still will take extra time. Still I gave the product 5 stars because of the end results, being so small the price could be a little better but the plus in the size is that it's not too heavy to handle. I would refer this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Portable Steamer. Heats Up Fast
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Small steamer but it works great. It heats up really fast- quicker than the industrial units I am used to working with, and it takes out wrinkles quickly. The tank doesn’t hold much water so you have to fill every couple of minutes, but that is to be expected at this size and price point. I knocked it over a couple times and it doesn’t spill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice compact device. Works well on most fabrics. Some require a second round after the first has dried. Very small water tank so not a long run of steam. Says to cool down between uses and that makes it a time consuming process. Working ok for my needs (destination wedding) but for more frequent use I would go for one with a bigger watt tank and longer run time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it says works very good can't go wrong with this purchase
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for a easy way to take wrinkles out of some light weight and soft type of clothing and this works fantastic so glad I found it at such a good price and delivery was quick and the unit easy to start up and use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel buddy!!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this two days before a trip to a bridal shower I had to travel to. I called the hotel in advance to see if there was a clothes steamer on-site, and was informed that there was not, only the standard ironing board and iron. I decided to purchase this one and hope for the best as I hate ironing and always have wrinkled clothes when I travel. It was relatively easy to travel with. I had it in the side pocket of a duffel bag, which I carried onto the plane.Thoughts: This worked really well! It took all the wrinkles out of my dresses in minutes along with the shirts I had folded but got shifted during travel causing those pesky wrinkles.The only con is that the water from the steamer evaporated into steam very quickly (maybe 10-15 mins of steam), and the instructions state that you must turn off the unit after the water is evaporated and wait until cool down to refill the vessel. I was able to do one long dress before it ran out and then I let it cool down throughout the day and refilled the vessel to steam two other shirts before it again ran out of steam.But overall I’m happy with the product. It did a great job for what I needed it to do!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's not a bad price and it's easy enough to use. It just doesn't hold much water, so you have to refill it every couple of minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to use. Let's out a lot of steam. This product us good for travel or even to use in uour home to get wrinkles out in a hurry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for Travel
reviews.reviewText: Update:We had the steamer for about a month now and as we've tried it on different clothing materials we realized it doesn't work as well on specific types of material such as Nylong. It also takes a lot longer to stream things than our previous steamer. We ended up returning the item.Previous Review:We got this as our old travel steamer broke due to wattage issues. We took this on a trip with us recently and the steamer works very well and removes wrinkles fairly fast. It also doesn't leave those water spots that can sometimes occur with steamers.Just a heads up, this model is a bit bigger than the one we had previously - not so much so that it's hard to travel with but it does take up more space than we're used to. It also weights a bit more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Warms up very quickly and works well
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item to steam the wrinkles out of a satin wedding dress and it worked perfectly! It heated up very quickly and steamed out all of the wrinkles. I'm very satisfied with my purchase!
Muy buen producto, si plancha muy bien

Easy to use and works okay? Some wrinkles are harder to smooth out and at first try it didn’t seem to work… but tried again and it seemed fine. Have used a couple of times on light dresses. Haven’t tried on any heavier fabrics yet.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente alternativa a una plancha: quita arrugas sin quitar espacio en tu casa
reviews.reviewText: Escribo esta reseña rápidamente después de apenas 1 uso, primera vez en mi vida que uso este tipo de productos: CUMPLE SU FUNCIÓN.No es un reemplazo completo de una plancha, pero sí que ayuda a quitar gran parte de las arrugas. Es bastante fácil de usar: abres arriba la boquilla, le echas un poco de agua, la enchufas, enciendes y en 1 minuto ya está generando vapor.Toma más tiempo y pasadas que una plancha regular, pero no requiere la tabla ni tanto aparataje. Es bastante pequeña como para poder llevarla de viaje, y suficientemente potente como para usarla en casa.Opino que es es casi esencial usar un guante de planchado, que afortunadamente compré también (misma marca Conair) o de lo contrario es fácil quemarse porque el vapor sale sumamente caliente.En mi primer uso, rellené en total 2 veces el depósito de agua para planchar la camisa blanca que aparece en la foto, pero definitivamente creo que es cuestión de acostumbrarse y aprender a usar eficientemente el vapor. El pantalón que aparece en la segunda imagen es grueso y de mezclilla y solo usé 1 rellenada de agua.En promedio creo que uno toma 15 minutos en desarrugar ropa tan arrugada como la que aparece en las fotos. El mejor lugar que encontré en casa para planchar es en el tubo de la ducha (disculpen el desorden). Si pones la ropa en una puerta corres el riesgo de dañar la puerta con el calor o ensuciar la ropa. Según lo que veo, es solo para uso vertical (y para esto, nuevamente el guante de planchado ayuda mucho).Para la cantidad de ropa que plancho, definitivamente es una buena opción. SI planchas toda tu ropa y e eres muy maniático con las arrugas, tal vez es mejor opción comprar una plancha normal, con su tabla. La ventaja es que el tratamiento de vapor evita que deje algunos tipos de tela con brillo y además sirve para quitar arrugas en sacos o abrigos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto. Buena longitud de cable.
reviews.reviewText: No es para planchar. Excelente para desarrugar prendas. Excelente longitud de cable, aunque poca capacidad para el agua. Hay que rellenar 2 o 3 veces por prenda. Excelente precio.
